title: Ep 59: Aliza Licht Shares the Most Honest Career Advice We've Heard.
itunes:title: Ep 59: Aliza Licht Shares the Most Honest Career Advice We've Heard.
description:
We couldn't be more excited to have Aliza Licht with us this week! You may know her as "DKNY PR Girl" back in the day on Twitter and Tumblr. She recently left her role at Alice & Olivia and is launching her own podcast SOON. In today's episode, she answers all fo your career questions and gives some of the best and most honest career advice we've heard - advice for interns, why "Can I pick your brain" is everyone's least favorite question, the importance of paper trails, DIY PR strategies, and so much more.

Also in this episode, Becca has found the best place to buy blinds (we're such adults) and Grace is binge-watching a new show.

Make sure to follow Aliza on twitter and instagram, and buy her book, Leave Your Mark!

Sponsor: 

  • Night Pillow: For 20% off your Night Pillow, visit DiscoverNight.com and enter code BOP20 at checkout.
  • LOLA: For 40% off all subscriptions, use code BOP at mylola.com
  • Darrell Lea: Visit their Amazon Shop and stock up on Real Twists. https://www.amazon.com/darrelllea

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
